name: Trigger.dev
long_description:
Write workflows in normal async code and we'll handle the rest, from queues to elastic scaling. No timeouts, retries, observability, and zero infrastructure to manage.

Previously, the founders built JSON Hero, an open source JSON viewer that is currently used by more than 35k developers a month. Eric was CTO of Code School, an early code learning platform that was acquired in 2015. Matt created two iPad apps that won Appleâ€™s App of the Year.
one_liner: Open source background jobs & AI infrastructure
